pages.text: Throughout this almanac, we will refer to a people that we have named the $(bold)Ancients$(). We know very little about their appearance, their demeanor, or how they communicated, but through examination of their technologies, we have uncovered their customs.$(br2)These people were always striving for progress, truly more advanced than their contemporaries.

Even though we have discovered much about them, many findings remain unexplained, such as the metaphysical properties of Warpaths and $(item)Purpeille Armor$() as you will recognize in later chapters.$(br2)Following the path of the Ancients is a journey of allegiance: one that will test your might, but gift you with unsurpassed power.
